/_\Delta/_\

"my....my....weapons??!!" *looks at his carriage cannon* "i'll 
just....um...." *tugs at it* "...maybe if i...." *doesn't budge* 
"...um....yea...i think....*tug*.....no...ah....um..." *sweet drop*
"oh boy... i wish......i wish.....it would just transform." just as he said 
that his carriage cannon transformed into a normal (slightly large) hand.  
"Um.....will that do?" he asked.

OOC: sorry, i never thought Delta would have to give up his weapons.
